thread.title: BRIEF-San Miguel Pure Foods Clarifies On Article “SMC Food Unit To Conduct Follow-On Offering By Q2” ‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-San Miguel Pure Foods Clarifies On Article “SMC Food Unit To Conduct Follow-On Offering By Q2” ‍​

organizations.name: san miguel pure foods company inc

text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - San Miguel Pure Foods Company Inc :
* CLARIFIES ON NEWS ARTICLE ENTITLED “SMC FOOD UNIT TO CONDUCT FOLLOW-ON OFFERING BY Q2” ‍​
* CONFIRMS STATEMENTS , ADVISES STATEMENT OF FERDINAND K CONSTANTINO RELATE TO ANNUAL REVENUE ESTIMATES OF 3 CO‘S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
